name: testdouble
description: A minimal test double library for TDD with JavaScript

scripts.clean: rm -rf generated dist lib && git checkout -- dist
scripts.compile: npm run compile:node && npm run compile:test && npm run compile:browser
scripts.test:example:webpack: cd examples/webpack && npm i && npm test & cd ../..
scripts.test:example:node: cd examples/node && npm i && npm test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example:browser: cd examples/getting-started && npm i && npm test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example: npm run test:example:node && npm run test:example:browser && npm run test:example:webpack
scripts.test:all: npm run test --testdouble:mocha_reporter=tap && testem ci && npm run test:example
scripts.test:ci: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run test:all
scripts.version: npm run compile && git add dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
